text: Can any one of you know how to filter hubdb row based on updatedAt time

Hello, I'm struggling with how to get this full error response message to be returned using the */crm/v3/objects/contacts* create endpoint, I jusy seem to get 'Error: Request failed with status code 409', which I know is the code I'm expecting but doesn't give me the ID to use for the update endpoint, can anybody help with the syntax I need?
This is what my error handling currently looks like

how do i fix postman so I can simulate an OAuth token request?
1. I have a test app in my developer account
2. That app is installed in my sandbox CMS account
3. Postman is connecting to the sandbox account and authorizing, but returning `Error: Could not complete OAuth 2.0 token request`
4. My client_id and secret are redacted for screenshot only, of course
5. Postman doesn’t allow overwrite of its callback URL
<@UDEASNWEB> change the Client Authentication (last field) to Send client credentials in body
Zack you are a lifesaver, THANK YOU
If you want that exact error you’ll have to look into the response object.
I believe it would look something like this

Hi all,
I have a question.
I am using CMS Site Search API.
However, there are some issues.
I don’t want the search results to include html of header, footer and side bar.
Among the parameters of the search api, html can be searched or not searched using property.
However, there are no parameters that can exclude headers and footers.
Is there any way to exclude headers and footers when searching through the CMS Site Search API?
